title: Donate
content:
Wow! Thanks for wanting to help The Caregiver Act become a reality. We truly appreciate it.\
\
**Donations are currently in testing!**

***[Click here](https://buy.stripe.com/test_00gbMyf0e2Hj3UQ5kn)*** to give us $2.00. 

OR\
\
***[Click here](https://buy.stripe.com/test_eVa03Q8BQfu50IEdQS)*** to give us $2.00 **every month**.

For current testing 4242 4242 4242 4242 and 4/24 and 424 will be a successful payment.\
\
What it goes towards:

* Operation costs, primarily letters to representatives.
